attributes.action: Protect UK's Greenbelt from being used to build on.
attributes.additional_details: Due to escalating population levels and housing shortages there has been much talk of use of Greenbelt and making building applications easier for builders. It should concern us all. Builders and politicians need to be more imaginative with unused buildings and brownfield sites.
attributes.background: There seems to be a creeping acceptance that we need to build on the Greenbelt. I think it's imperative we protect and preserve beautiful parts of Britain for future generations. It must be the red line builders can not cross. We don't want Britain to become a concrete jungle.
